General.Name: Bahvest Resources Bhd
General.Description: Bahvest Resources Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the gold and silver mining business in Malaysia. The company operates through three segments: Mining Operations, Aquaculture Operations, and Investment Holding. Its gold mine deposit covers a total mining area of 317.7 hectares located in Tawau. The company was formerly known as Borneo Aqua Harvest Berhad and changed its name to Bahvest Resources Berhad in December 2018. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Tawau, Malaysia.
